Figure 13: Ventilation with bag and mask
If the chest does not expand adequately, it may be due to one or more of the following 
reasons:
/circle6   Th e seal is inadequate—re-apply the mask to the face and try to form a better seal.
/circle6   Th e airway is blocked—correct the baby’s position and clear any secretions present from 
the mouth and nose.
